title: Aleksandar Stojković
text: Aleksandar Stojković (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Александар Стојковић; born 15 August 1990 in <a href="Sombor">Sombor</a>) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>, playing for <a href="FK%20Budu%C4%87nost%20Dobanovci">FK Budućnost Dobanovci</a>.
